\w And|strong="H4325"\w* again \w he|strong="H4058"\w* \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* \w a|strong="H4058"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w he|strong="H4058"\w* brought me \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H4058"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* up \w to|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H4058"\w* \w knees|strong="H1290"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4325"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*. \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* brought \w me|strong="H3808"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w up|strong="H1342"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w loins|strong="H4325"\w*. \w And|strong="H4325"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* torrent, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w risen|strong="H1342"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* deep torrent, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0559"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Surely|strong="H7725"\w* thou hast \w seen|strong="H7200"\w*, O \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0559"\w* \w brought|strong="H7725"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w out|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0559"\w* caused \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w bank|strong="H8193"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* torrent.

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w when|strong="H7725"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* had \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* myself, \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w bank|strong="H8193"\w* \w of|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* torrent \w were|strong="H2088"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* both \w sides|strong="H2088"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w These|strong="H0428"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w issue|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w toward|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* hillocks \w of|strong="H5921"\w* sand \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* east, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w plains|strong="H6160"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w desert|strong="H6160"\w*, \w shall|strong="H0428"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w shall|strong="H0428"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w shall|strong="H0428"\w* \w be|strong="H4325"\w* \w healed|strong="H7495"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* fishers shall \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* these waters, \w from|strong="H5921"\w* Engaddi \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* Engallim \w there|strong="H1961"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* drying \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w nets|strong="H2764"\w*: \w there|strong="H1961"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* sorts \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* fishes thereof, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* fishes \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* multitude:

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w on|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* shore thereof, \w and|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* fenny places \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w healed|strong="H7495"\w*, because \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w turned|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5414"\w* saltpits.

\w And|strong="H6086"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* torrent \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w banks|strong="H8193"\w* thereof \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w both|strong="H4480"\w* \w sides|strong="H2088"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w grow|strong="H5927"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w bear|strong="H1069"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w*: \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w leaf|strong="H5929"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fall|strong="H1961"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fail|strong="H8552"\w*: \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* firstfruits, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* thereof \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w issue|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*: \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fruits|strong="H6529"\w* thereof \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w food|strong="H3978"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w leaves|strong="H5929"\w* thereof \w for|strong="H3588"\w* medicine.

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*: \w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w*, \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w possess|strong="H5157"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* according \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w twelve|strong="H6240"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* hath \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w double|strong="H8147"\w* portion.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w possess|strong="H5157"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*, \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w like|strong="H0834"\w* manner \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*: concerning \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* unto \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w possession|strong="H5159"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w*, \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w by|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Hethalon, \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w men|strong="H1419"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* Sedada,

Emath, Berotha, Sabarim, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w between|strong="H0996"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w* \w and|strong="H2574"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* Emath, \w the|strong="H0834"\w* house \w of|strong="H1366"\w* Tichon, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* Auran.

\w And|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w even|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* court \w of|strong="H1366"\w* Enan, \w shall|strong="H1366"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*, \w and|strong="H3220"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w*: \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* Emath, this \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w midst|strong="H0996"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Auran, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w midst|strong="H0996"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w midst|strong="H0996"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Galaad, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w midst|strong="H0996"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* making \w the|strong="H0853"\w* bound \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* thus \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w measure|strong="H4058"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \w southward|strong="H5045"\w* \w is|strong="H4325"\w* \w from|strong="H6285"\w* Thamar \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* contradiction \w of|strong="H4325"\w* Cades: \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* torrent \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*: \w and|strong="H1419"\w* this \w is|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \w southward|strong="H5045"\w*.
